title: Daily Note - 2025-06-26
summary: Focused on setting up and testing Obsidian MCP integration, creating comprehensive guidance documentation, and exploring automation possibilities.
accomplishments: Integrated Obsidian with Claude Code using MCP server
insights: Templates work by reading template files and replacing variables
MCP provides direct access to Obsidian without manual API calls
Can automate daily note creation with templates
The MCP integration opens up powerful automation possibilities
